```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tibble)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggfortify)
library(OpenImageR)
library(fastICA)
library(NMF)
olfaction_data <- read.csv('training_set.txt', header = T, sep = '\t')
mol_desc <- read.csv('molecular_descriptors.txt', header = T, sep = '\t')
olfaction_data
mol_desc
```

```{r}
#joining data
olfaction_data$CID <- olfaction_data$Compound.Identifier

joined <- merge(olfaction_data, mol_desc, by = "CID")
head(joined)

```
```{r}
#olfaction_data <- na.omit(olfaction_data)
levels(joined$Intensity)
filter(joined, Intensity == "high ")
```
